text: Costas Takkas (, ) is a football administrator, the attaché to the CONCACAF president, and the former CIFA general secretary. Takkas was arrested in May 2015 in Switzerland to face corruption charges in the United States. He was banned by FIFA Ethics Committee. Takkas obtained his designation as a chartered accountant from the Institute of Chartered Accountants in England and Wales in 1982, having earned his undergraduate degree from Imperial College London in 1978. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:Football people in the Cayman Islands Category:Living people
title: Costas Takkas
